name: REÇEL
description:
REÇEL

 Hyzef Studios

Developed by Berat Çakır & Ömer F. Aydın

Controls:

W A S D : Movement

Space : Jump

Left Mouse : Event

Right Mouse : Aim

F : Flash Light

G : Take Crowbar

T : Use Clock

ESC : Back To Main Menu

Kullanılan Assetler

Textures : https://textures.com/

Particles : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/unity-particle-pack...

Sounds : Half Life 2 Sounds

Sky Box : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...

version : 1.0R
